A full list is available at http://sos.ga.gov http://pbs.twimg.com/media/FjTBs5VXgAAjA4g.jpg
If you are over 75 or disabled, you can GO TO THE FRONT of the line between 9:30am and 4:30pm.
If you don‚Äôt have a driver‚Äôs license, you can vote with any of the following forms of ID. A full list is available at http://sos.ga.gov http://pbs.twimg.com/media/FjTBpFoWQAAo3Pr.jpg

If you didn‚Äôt vote in the General, you can still vote in the Runoff, as long as you‚Äôre registered!

Over 75,000 Georgians have already voted in the Runoff who didn‚Äôt vote in the General.
If you voted in the General Election, you need to vote again! Votes do not carry over.
Your vote is too important to let rain get in the way. Bring an umbrella, jacket, hot chocolate or coffee, whatever you need to be ready!
If you are in line by the time polls close, YOU NEED TO STAY IN LINE! You will be allowed to check in to vote.

First and foremost, your polling location might have changed from the General Election. PLEASE double-check your polling location at https://iwillvote.com/GA before heading out.
